actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to expand the Boulder Canyon project to provide for the construction of a highway crossing of the Colorado River immediately downstream from Hoover Dam.

summary.text: Provides for the construction of a highway crossing of the Colorado River immediately downstream from the Hoover Dam. Provides that the cost of the highway crossing shall be recoverable from revenues from the Boulder Canyon Project.

titles.title: A bill to expand the Boulder Canyon project to provide for the construction of a highway crossing of the Colorado River immediately downstream from Hoover Dam.
